name: Veggie Rice
detail: A deliciously sweet mini cob of golden corn, served with steamed Tex Mex rice, fresh lettuce, chopped tomatoes and a bean salsa, drizzled with sour cream sauce. Light, filling and delicious. Served with a drink.

name: Zinger Rice
detail: N'One piece of our fiery Zinger chicken with steamed Tex Mex rice, fresh lettuce and a bean salsa, drizzled with sour cream sauce. Light, filling and spicy.

name: Zinger Burger
detail: Our simple, succulent 100% chicken breast Fillet burger, plus spine-tingling Zing. With regular fries and a regular drink.

name: Kids PopCorn Chicken
detail: Our one hundred chicken breast Popcorn Chicken pieces. A fun, bite-sized snack.

name: Boneless Banquet
detail: A banquet of three chicken breast Mini Fillets, plus Popcorn Chicken, regular fries, regular side, one KFC Original Dip and drink. A fuss-free dipper's delight.

name: Boneless Dips
detail: Four of our chicken breast Mini Fillets, with two KFC Original Dips, a regular side and drink. A no-fuss feast.

name: Mighty Bucket
detail: Two pieces of Original Recipe chicken, two chicken breast Mini Fillets and a pair of spicy hot wings.

name: Zinger Stacker
detail: Made with two fiery zinger fillets, topped with two slices of cheese, supercharger and sweet chilli sauce. Fiery and delicious. With regular fries and drink.

name: Zinger Stacker 2
detail: Made with two fiery zinger fillets, topped with two slices of cheese, supercharger and sweet chilli sauce. Fiery and delicious. With regular fries and drink.

name: Zinger Stacker 3
detail: Made with two fiery zinger fillets, topped with two slices of cheese, supercharger and sweet chilli sauce. Fiery and delicious. With regular fries and drink.
